website_summaries.verdict: Simple design for an elegant coffee table. Excellent natural oak finish mounted on top of a solid black metal frame.
pros: Easy installation requires only a few screws to attach the tabletop to the leg supports
Can be done quickly in a single setting
cons: Tabletop provides limited space compared to other coffee tables

customer_reviews.title: Open Box = missing hardware but still beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an open box from Amazon Warehouse. It was in perfect condition and was easy to assemble. However, it was missing a washer and two screws as well as the furniture pads for the bottom. Luckily, I was able to make it work - but the process didn’t match the assembly instructions. No big deal, it’s still perfect for my living room and looks amazing. Super sturdy and sleek. Just be aware if you purchase the open box! It will be as described but may not have all the hardware due to its “openboxness” :)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Minimalistic. Nice. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my livingroom because it matched the bookshelfs I earlier purchased. The table was super easy to assemble. It came in perfect condition too! It does loose 1 star because there are screws sticking out on the bottom bars. I have tile flooring and these screws scratch up my floor. They do include little white sticker feet but those do not stay on. Overall, I like this table and love that it matches the bookshelfs to pull my livingroom together.
customer_reviews.author: Bratlie

customer_reviews.title: Modern Dopeness!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!!! I used it in one of my AIR BNB but soon took it out and put it in my place because I loved it so much Pro: it was easy to install/ sturdy Con: just the stickies rubber protectors that they give you to protect the table from scratching the floor sucks, it actually leaves rubber marks on the floor (but there easily wipe upable), and then the rubber protector moves or come off . They need to design something better for that, but besides that it’s great !!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle P.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This works great with my modern/chic living room. I really love it. Definitely get some coasters and don't put anything even a little hot on it. I put a bag of popcorn that just came out of the microwave down on it and it left a mark.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good table if it didn’t come with defects
customer_reviews.text: The actual coffee table is great. However, the first time I ordered it, it came with a smashed corner. No problem, maybe the delivery was dropped l. I returned it and received a new one. This one has a giant, deep scratch across the top of the table clearly. I’m so disappointed and done trying to order a new one.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is perfect for our family room. No coasters needed and the kids can be comfortable. The first table arrived damaged and it was quickly replaced. Then a few days later a box of chocolates arrived to apologize for the inconvenience. Over the top service! Track this company for new arrivals. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Audible Account

customer_reviews.title: nice table but color not represented well in the picture
customer_reviews.text: i like this table's minimalist style however the description says white with light brown. the table is definitely not as blonde as pictured. i am disappointed but will keep it, not worth the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: cheap laminate look
customer_reviews.text: I expected the table to be oak veneer. It is a cheap looking laminate. Sides don't even match the top. It is probably okay for a first time apartment. It is going back.
customer_reviews.author: cthelurker

customer_reviews.title: solid and nice color
customer_reviews.text: this table is simple yet very stylish at the same time. it has a nice and soft color and the material is good enough for the price. I am totally satisfied with the price and the quality. they should also do side table to match the coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials but works
customer_reviews.text: My table came a little dinged up, but I honestly didn’t want to wait to attempt to get a replacement. It’s already peeling a little from the cheap materials, but it works for a coffee table and matches the rest of my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surface was bubbled/color off
customer_reviews.text: We really like this design, so it was too bad when the veneer on top was bubbled when it came. More than this, though, we thought from the product photos for the light brown/black table that the top would be lighter, like a pine, to match our floors. But it was darker, almost greenish/brown, like a walnut. Not what we wanted. Perhaps we got the wrong item sent to us? If we did, we hope the seller will contact us. We would still like to be able to use this table with the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I was very excited to build the table but it came dinged I don’t know how this even happened. The box is also damaged so maybe that’s what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi

customer_reviews.title: Crease and chips in the wood. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered with chips and a CREASE in the wood... For the cost, this is unacceptable. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was super easy to set up. No scratches like some other reviews said.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together but dissappomted that there are chips and scratches in it and it hasnt even been used!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy at all. Tightened down all the bolts as hard as I could and it still wobbles quite a bit any time you bump it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking table for the price. I just got it and it took me all of 15 minutes to assemble. Looks like it could’ve come from a high end retailer. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Tripodi

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but looks expensive!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and it looks very nice! Well worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our new coffee table from Nathan James! It’s durable as I have three wild boys and it’s very cute and stylish in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Fox

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because it’s wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this! Looks good but very wobbly. One of the screws were stripped when we received it, so not sure if that’s why it’s so wobbly. Maybe we can’t get it tight enough. Because of that it feels cheap. Very disappointed becusse the colors are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: The table is good quality but came in different color. I ordered white/oak and received white/ rustic oak which is much darker. No matches with the other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Ilieva

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and looks great, but the table arrived with scratches on it. It is also wobbly. One of the screws does not go in properly. Looks nice, but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Klein

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like picture shows
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coffee table! Exactly what I thought it would be. The wood stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Great size and style!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Replaced a table I originally bought at ikea. Previous table was too small and pricey. This table is great. Nathan James also has great customer service. I called the number provided and they were able to get me what I needed super quick! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Hafemann

customer_reviews.title: The support team was super responsive in getting a replacement table sent and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the table at first and one of the screws didn't fit properly. The support team was super responsive in getting a replacement table sent and was kind enough to even send over chocolates to make up for the initial mishap. The table looks great in my apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Jer

product_meta.title: Nathan James 31102 Doxa Modern Industrial Coffee Table Wood and Metal Box Frame, Light Brown/Black
product_meta.description: Color:Light Brown/BlackNathan James is the furniture company built for this generation. You don't need to spend a fortune to get quality design-first furniture and when we say easy assembly, We mean it. our is our word. Your purchase is backed by a 100% money-back . If you have any quality issues just contact us and we will send you a replacement immediately, No questions asked. create an inviting ambiance to your living room by adding the stylish doxa coffee table. A sturdy framed metal base with wide, open sides supports this home furniture, which adds visual space to your room. The tabletop is constructed with a thick piece of Acacia veneer wood for a modern yet rustic effect. materials: - acacia wood veneer and MDF particleboard>- matte black powder-coated steel base frame assembly must-haves: - Phillips or flat head screw driver weight limit: 100 lbs.
feature_bullets: Minimalist coffee table with open-frame design adds visual space to your room.
Stylishly made with dark brown engineered wood, acacia veneer, and sturdy black metal frame.
Free returns for 90 days and lifetime manufacturer warranty.
Full Table Length: 44” x Width: 22” x Height: 17” espresso table.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars43 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
